name: Star Wars Arcade (itch)
description:
Hi guys, this game works well on scratch too, here's the link: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/411549157/

Use W and S or Up arrow and down arrow. Space to shoot. And go for the best time! Second player: Use the arrow keys. Tablet: Use the buttons to control! May the force be with you always! P.S. To move keep clicking on up or down.

Thanks to my family for getting me a ticket for the Rise of Skywalker. Thanks too Tuna_sandwich180 for testing out this game!
